comments: When n >=2, right side of binomial sum n-> sum( i^(n-i-1) * (n-i)^(i-1) *binomial(n, i), i=1..n-1) - Yong Kong (ykong(AT)curagen.com), Dec 28 2000
references: A. P. Prudnikov, Yu. A. Brychkov and O.I. Marichev, "Integrals and Series", Volume 1: "Elementary Functions", Chapter 4: "Finite Sums", New York, Gordon and Breach Science Publishers, 1986-1992, Eq. (4.2.2.38)
author: Joseph Moser (jmoser(AT)wcupa.edu)
